Reason: The MAX_HEIGHT configuration option in the batik software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. Increasing the MAX_HEIGHT value can lead to increased memory consumption and potentially longer execution times, especially when rendering large images or graphics. Conversely, decreasing the MAX_HEIGHT value may improve performance by reducing memory usage and speeding up processing, but it can also result in lower quality output. Therefore, any changes to the MAX_HEIGHT configuration should be carefully evaluated to ensure optimal system performance.
